idinfo.useconst: For use at 1:24,000 or smaller scale. For educational/demonstration purposes only. The Originator, Publisher and Distributor exclude any and all implied warranties and make no warranty or representation with respect to the data files or accompanying documentation, including quality, performance, merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. These data files and documentation are provided These data should not be redistributed for commercial profit. Reproduction or redistribution of this digital data set without permission of the Originator/Publisher is expressly forbidden. The Originator and Publisher should be clearly cited in any product derived from this data.

cntorgp.cntorg: Municipality of Murrysville Community Development Office

attracc.attraccr: Attributes have been checked by visual comparison of source against the hard copy plots and/or interactive display of digital data. Municipal attribute data is also in the process of verification through field surveys which confirm address data, land use data, and other information.

dataqual.logic: Data set topology exists. No duplicate features. All polygons closed as verified from hard copy plots.
dataqual.complete: Complete for all areas in the bounding coordinates except the Borough of Export. Some condominiums and mobile homes have yet to be added.

horizpa.horizpar: Visual verification. Original source materials meeting National Map Accuracy Standards for 1:24,000 scale maps were corrected against USGS Digital orthophoto quadrangles with 10 meter resolution. 90% of points checked from plot measure within .001" of position on source materials.

srcinfo.srccontr: features locations for digitization and verification

procstep.procdesc: The county tax map attribute data was expanded with municipal information from the planning department and field surveys. Spatial data will be updated and edited using surveys from recently submitted plans, hard copy county tax maps, 1993 DOQ's,and aerial photos, when available.

cntorgp.cntorg: Municipality of Murrysville Community Development Office

overview.eaover: The table contours.pat contains the following Variable Definition Tax ID Tax identification number. Name Name of property owner. Deed book Deed book page number. A. Imp. Assessed value of improvements to a parcel. A. Land Assessed value of land. A. Total Total assessed value of parcel. Landuse Landuse defined as: Vacant; Industrial,Warehouse,and Storage; Single Family Residential; Large Lot Res. (10 acre or >); Commercial (small office, retail etc.); Public and Semi-Public ( utilities, cultural, religious, and government activities) Recreation and Conservation (Parks, land owned by environmental and recreational organizations, protected by government for conservation purposes, etc.) Zoning Zoning of a parcel. Buildout Boolean field indicating the presence of major buildings on a property. Sewer Boolean field indicating the presence of public sewer on a property. Mailing Address The owner's address. Site Address The street address of primary building on the parcel. Lot Number The lot number of a parcel. Subdivision The name of the subdivision of which a parcel is a part.
